sentences.en: "He's been arrested for theft and burglary." — "Good grief!"
sentences.cn: “他因为偷窃和入室盗窃而被逮捕了。”——“我的天哪！”

sentences.en: A burglary occurs every three minutes in London.
sentences.cn: 伦敦每3分钟就会发生一起入室抢劫案。

sentences.en: A small sum of money is supposed to be forked out quarterly for burglary and robbery insurance.
sentences.cn: 每季度要交一小笔防盗防抢保险金.

sentences.en: He was jailed for 33 months to run concurrently with a sentence he is already serving for burglary.
sentences.cn: 他被判33个月的监禁，与他因入室盗窃已在服的刑期合并执行。

sentences.en: He's been put inside for burglary.
sentences.cn: 他因犯盗窃罪而被关押.

sentences.en: I bought some new locks as an additional insurance against burglary.
sentences.cn: 我买了一些新锁具以进一步防止盗窃.

sentences.en: I don't buy the burglary story.
sentences.cn: 我可不相信这种夜间遭到撬窃的说法.

sentences.en: Many victims of burglary feel their homes have been defiled.
sentences.cn: 许多家门被撬的人都感到自己的家被玷污了。
入室盗窃案多数发生在夜间。

sentences.en: Now my house is secure against burglary.
sentences.cn: 现在我的房子无被盗窃之危险.

sentences.en: The burglary had all the hallmarks of a professional job.
sentences.cn: 从各方面来看,这起入室行窃案都是职业惯犯做的.

sentences.en: The men were pulled in on suspicion of having committed a burglary.
sentences.cn: 这些人因涉嫌犯有夜盗罪而被拘留.

sentences.en: The youth was charged with three counts of burglary.
sentences.cn: 那位年轻人被控犯有三次盗窃罪。

sentences.en: There was a neat safe burglary in Indiana.
sentences.cn: 在印第安纳发生了一起不落痕迹的保险箱盗窃案.

sentences.en: To minimize the risk of burglary, install a good alarm system.
sentences.cn: 安装可靠的报警设备以减低被盗的风险.

trans.tran_en: the crime of getting into a building to steal things
